user_query: Why is alpha surveying an area with a modified trajectory while avoiding obstacle e instead of returning to its starting position?
explanation: Alpha is currently on its way to point 1 as part of its survey mission. However, it encountered obstacle e in close proximity in the southwest direction. Returning to the starting position would only be appropriate if there were no obstacles in the way.
